summary: Request to add a TypeScript DSL workflow example to match existing examples in Go and Java SDKs. This would provide TypeScript developers with a complete reference implementation of DSL patterns.
userImpact: TypeScript developers lack a DSL example to understand workflow patterns that are already documented in other language SDKs.
proposedFix: Add a TypeScript DSL workflow example similar to the Go and Java examples
resolutionDetails: DSL example was added to the TypeScript SDK documentation/examples
keyQuote: To do add a TS example for the DSL workflow similar to Go and Java.
